attributes.action: That Parliament should bestow on HRH The Queen the title ‘Elizabeth the Great’
attributes.background:
Alfred is the only monarch in English history to be called The Great. To recognise HRH’s unique and exemplary service to GB it is proposed that Queen Elizabeth is also so designated.

This would be a fitting tribute from a grateful nation to HRH in this jubilee year.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for a monarch to be given a particular title.
